Santa_Clara.Hotel Montgomery:
The Four Points by Sheraton San Jose Downtown or Hotel Montgomery is a historic boutique hotel in Downtown San José, California.


== History ==
In an effort to preserve the hotel, and to accommodate the 13-story, 264 room expansion of the Fairmont San Jose Hotel, the San Jose Redevelopment Agency had the Montgomery moved 57 m (187 ft) south of its original location at First Street and Paseo de San Antonio at a cost of $8.6 million. The total cost of the renovation, including the move, was $25.5 million.
